name: Native Web Components - Browser Default's UI Kit
description:
They’re the browser defaults. They’re not sexy. They’re not styled.

They're the WYSIWYG, out of the box, as-is components, used in forms, controls and user inputs.


No web designer will include them in their portfolio without restyling them. But they will have used them in their work. Checkboxes, radios, select boxes, dropdowns, calender, date picker, folders and more…


I've used this library to help me speed up quick wireframes, forms and a couple of fugly CMSs. Basically, anything that needs very little styling.


If you’re like me, even though you know they're the default, I know you want to get all the pixels jussst right... and with this library you can!


This comprehensive Figma Library will help you speed up the next time you're faced with similar design challenges.
